name: FounderDating, Inc.
description: Provider of an online social network platform to connect entrepreneurs. The company provides an online dating platform that enables entrepreneurs to connect, share and help potential Co-Founders, advisors and professionals and skilled individuals.
one_liner: Provider of an online social network platform to connect entrepreneurs. The company provides an online dating platform that enables entrepreneurs to connect, share and help potential Co-Founders, advisors and professionals and skilled individuals.
